meanings.sent1: He felt dweeby at the party, unsure how to join conversations.
meanings.sent2: She always acts a bit dweeby around new people.
meanings.sent3: His dweeby attempts at dancing made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The dweeby penguin waddled clumsily on the ice.
meanings.sent5: The dweeby character in the movie was endearing in his awkwardness.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a nerdy or uncool manner
meanings.sent1: The glasses and pocket protector made him look dweeby.
meanings.sent2: She found his dweeby jokes surprisingly funny.
meanings.sent3: His dweeby fashion sense was actually quite charming.
meanings.sent4: The dweeby scientist saved the day with his brilliant invention.
meanings.sent5: The dweeby character in the show was a lovable geek.

meanings.definition: A person who is overly studious or intellectual
meanings.sent1: The dweeby in the library always had a stack of books.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the class dweeby for her perfect grades.
meanings.sent3: The dweeby won the spelling bee with ease.
meanings.sent4: The dweeby was lost in thought, pondering complex theories.
meanings.sent5: The dweeby excelled in academics, impressing everyone with her knowledge.
